column15: Buy original Revolving MOP Blue Colour at best price in India. Read its features  reviews and specifications. Get fast & assured delivery all over India.
column17:
Revolving MOP Blue Colour:

It’s an easy to use and durable mop to keep every nook and corner of the house clean. With the spin dry water bucket you can choose the level of wetness in micro-fabric mop head without getting your hands in dirty water. The mop easily absorbs water removes dirt and fights against bacteria to leave floors clean & hygienic.
